> | An {{domxref("RTCSessionDescriptionInit")}} or {{domxref("RTCSessionDescription")}} ^ | which specifies the configuration to be applied to the local end of the connection. If | the description is omitted, the WebRTC runtime tries to automatically do the right

title: RTCPeerConnection: setLocalDescription() method
summary:
The RTCPeerConnection method
  setLocalDescription() changes
  the local description associated with the connection. This description specifies the
  properties of the local end of the connection, including the media format.
  The method takes a single parameter—the session description—and it returns a
  Promise which is fulfilled once the description has been changed,
  asynchronously.
pageTitle: RTCPeerConnection: setLocalDescription() method - Web APIs | MDN
